name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When the forthcoming event does occur.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then none will be able to deny its occurrence.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The event will be abasing some, and exalting some.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When the earth will tremble, shivering.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And the mountains will be crushed, blown to bits.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So they will become like fine dust, scattered in a shaft of light.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And you will become divided into three categories.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So those on the right – how (fortunate) are those on the right!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And those on the left – how (wretched) are those on the left!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And those who surpassed have indeed excelled.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: It is they who are the close ones.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They are in Gardens of peace.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: A large group from the earlier generations.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And a few from the latter.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: On studded thrones.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Reclining on them, facing each other.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Surrounded by immortal boys.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Carrying bowls and pitchers – and cups filled with wine flowing before them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Their heads shall not ache with it, nor shall they lose their senses.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And fruits that they may like.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And meat of birds that they may wish.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And gorgeous eyed fair maidens.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Like pearls safely hidden.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The reward for what they did.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They will not hear any useless speech in it, or any sin.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except the saying, “Peace, peace.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And those on the right – how (fortunate) are those on the right!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Among thorn-less lote-trees.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And clusters of banana plants.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And in everlasting shade.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And in perpetually flowing water.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And plenty of fruits.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: That will neither finish, nor ever be stopped.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And raised couches.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We have indeed developed these women with an excellent development.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So made them as maidens.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The beloved of their husbands, of one age.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: For those on the right.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: A large group from the earlier generations.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And a large group from the latter.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And those on the left – how (wretched) are those on the left!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In scorching wind and boiling hot water.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And in the shadow of a burning smoke.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Which is neither cool nor is for respect.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed they were among favours before this.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And were stubborn upon the great sin (of disbelief).

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they used to say, “When we are dead and have turned into dust and bones, will we surely be raised again?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And also our forefathers?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Proclaim, “Without doubt all – the former and the latter.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “They will all be gathered together – on the appointed time of the known day.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then indeed you, the astray, the deniers –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: You will indeed eat from the Zaqqum tree.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then will fill your bellies with it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And upon it, you will drink the hot boiling water.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Drinking the way thirsty camels drink.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is their reception on the Day of Justice.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: It is We Who created you, so why do you not accept the truth?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So what is your opinion regarding the semen you discharge?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Do you make a human out of it, or is it We Who create?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: It is We Who have ordained death among you, and We have not been beaten –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In the matter of exchanging you for others, and to transform you into what you do not know.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And you have indeed learnt about the first creation, so why do you not ponder?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So what is your opinion regarding what you sow?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Is it you who cultivate it, or is it We Who develop it?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: If We will We can make it like dry trampled hay, so you would keep crying out.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: That, “We have indeed been penalised!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “In fact, we were unfortunate!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So what is your opinion regarding the water that you drink?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Is it you who caused it to descend from the cloud, or is it We Who cause it to descend?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: If We will We can make it bitter, so why do you not give thanks?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So what is your opinion regarding the fire which you kindle?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Is it you who grew its tree, or is it We Who create?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We have made it as a reminder of hell and as a utility for travellers in the jungle.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) proclaim the Purity of the name of your Lord, the Greatest.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So I swear by the setting places of the stars.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And that is indeed a tremendous oath, if you understand.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is indeed the noble Qur’an.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Kept in a secure Book.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: None may touch it, except with ablution.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Sent down by the Lord Of The Creation.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So is this the matter regarding which you laze?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And you make its denial your share?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So why was it not, when the soul reaches up to the throat, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Whereas you watch at that moment!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We are nearer to him than you are, but you cannot see.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So why is it not, that if you are not to be repaid, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: That you bring it back, if you are truthful?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then if the dying one is of those having proximity, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then is relief, and flowers – and Gardens of peace.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And if he is of those on the right, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then upon you is the greetings of peace (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), from those on the right.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And if he is from the deniers, the astray, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then his reception is the hot boiling water.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And a hurling into the blazing fire.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is indeed an utmost certainty.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) proclaim the Purity of the name of your Lord, the Greatest.
